      • exportChartAsSVG

        protected void exportChartAsSVG(org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart chart,
                    java.awt.Rectangle bounds,
                    java.io.File svgFile)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Exports a JFreeChart to a SVG file using Apache Batik library.
        Parameters:
        chart - JFreeChart to export
        bounds - the dimensions of the viewport
        svgFile - the output file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if writing the svgFile fails.

      • exportChartAsPS

        protected void exportChartAsPS(org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart chart,
                   java.awt.Rectangle bounds,
                   java.io.File psFile,
                   java.lang.String mode)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Exports a JFreeChart to a PS file using Adobe XML graphics library.
        Parameters:
        chart - JFreeChart to export
        bounds - the dimensions of the viewport
        psFile - the output file.
        mode - the file write mode ("ps","eps")
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if writing the file fails.
